```{r}
# 課程作業(cdc.Rdata)
load("./riii/Statistics/cdc.Rdata")
cdc$exerany = as.factor(cdc$exerany)
cdc$hlthplan = as.factor(cdc$hlthplan)
cdc$smoke100 = as.factor(cdc$smoke100)
```


```{r}
# 1.資料中各健康狀況的分佈比例?
summary(cdc$genhlth)
```


```{r}
# 2.男女生中有抽菸的比例?
cdc %>%
  group_by(gender) %>%
  summarise(smoke = sum(smoke100=='1')/sum(cdc$smoke100))
```


```{r}
# 3.繪製年紀的直方圖
library('ggplot2')
h = ggplot(cdc, aes(x=age))
h + geom_bar()
```


```{r}
# 4.繪製不同健康狀況族群的BMI指數盒鬚圖
cdc = data.frame(cdc, bmi=cdc$weight/cdc$height^2*703)
h = ggplot(cdc, aes(x=genhlth, y=bmi))
h + geom_boxplot()
```


```{r}
# 5.身高、年紀、體重的相關係數
options(digits=2)
cor.test(cdc$height, cdc$weight)
cor.test(cdc$height, cdc$age)
cor.test(cdc$weight, cdc$age)
```
